roleset.name: dream while awake, fantasize
roleset.note: DAYDREAM-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. Relation to dream.01 (from daydream.01-v)

example.name: arg0
example.text: My SECOND -LRB- long story -RRB- drivers Ed teacher yelled : I do n't know what 's wrong with you . You-1 just start *T*-1 daydreaming or something !
